full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI MDOS CHO GA RDO RJE'I BRUG SGRA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES GNOD SBYIN CHE PO BEG TZE LCAM DRAL GYI MDOS CHOG RDO RJE'I 'BRUG SGRA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, LUG GI LO 'TSUB LTAS CHEB 'BYUNG BAR 'DI LTA BU BYED DGOS KYI RNAM PA RMI LAM DU SHAR BAS RANG DANG SGRUB GROGS DAG GIS LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR RIG 'DZIN GYI BTZUN PA ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'OD 'BAR GYI GZIMS CHUNG BDE CHEN PHUG DU MGYOGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DON 'GUB PO,, ,,)
